document_data.name: ''Forge Fire''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Forge Fire''''' was an enchanted [[light hammer]] that retained the blazing heat of the forge it was crated in.
document_data.Powers: ''Forge Fire'' had the ''+2'' enchantment and retained the scorching head of the forge it came from, dealing fire damage to its targets.
document_data.History:
The first ''Forge Fire's'' origins were tied to the adventuring past of [[Thalantyr]] the Conjurer and the traumatic incident when he was held prisoner by a powerful creature. Thalantyr refused to share the details of the story or how ''Forge Fire'' was enchanted to be as hot as the forge it was created in.

By [[1372 DR]], [[Derval Ironeater]] was creating replicas of the fiery hammer in his smith shop in [[Daggerford]], [[Derval's Bright Blade]].
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Veiti Ironeater]], the daughter of Derval Ironeater, wielded ''Forge Fire'' when she guided the heroes of Daggerford through the dangerous ruins of [[Illefarn]] in [[1372 DR]].
